class.name: AudioEffectRecordInstance
class.brief_description: Audio effect instance used for recording the sound from an audio bus from a particular audio channel.
class.description: Allows the user to record the sound from an individual channel of an audio bus into an [AudioStreamWAV]. When used on the "Master" audio bus, this includes all audio output for that channel by Godot. Unlike [AudioEffectCapture] or [AudioEffectCaptureInstance], this effect encodes the recording with the given format (8-bit, 16-bit, or compressed) instead of giving access to the raw audio samples. Can be used (with an [AudioStreamMicrophone]) to record from a microphone. An instance of this class can be obtained with [method AudioServer.get_bus_effect_instance]. [b]Note:[/b] [member ProjectSettings.audio/driver/enable_input] must be [code]true[/code] for audio input to work. See also that setting's description for caveats related to permissions and operating system privacy settings.

method.name: is_recording_active
method.description: Returns whether the recording is active or not.

method.name: set_recording_active
method.description: If [code]true[/code], the sound will be recorded. Note that restarting the recording will remove the previously recorded sample.

members.member: Specifies the format in which the sample will be recorded. Initialized to format of parent [AudioEffectRecord]. See [enum AudioStreamWAV.Format] for available formats.
